content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. What is your first offer, Haoyu Wang?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a bit low for this apartment, given its location and condition. I can offer you 1200 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more. I am asking for 1300 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your negotiating skills, but I think 1250 Euro per month is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, but I am not convinced. I am looking for 1350 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Unfortunately, that is out of my price range. I can offer you 1280 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort, but I am not satisfied with that offer. I demand 1400 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I can offer you 1320 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but I am not interested in such a low offer. I am asking for 1450 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
